permissions: Admin users can create tractor credentials. Non-admin users can create a tractor credential only if they are a manager of the tractor's trucker or broker and the credential classification is within their policy scope.
side_effects: Creates a tractor credential record linked to a tractor and a tractor trailer credential classification.
validation_notes: Required flags: --tractor and --tractor-trailer-credential-classification. Date fields (--issued-on, --expires-on) expect YYYY-MM-DD. If both issued_on and expires_on are set, expires_on must be >= issued_on. Credential periods cannot overlap an existing credential for the same tractor and classification.
